LayoutNode.Content: Should You Call the IRS?
LayoutNode.SRC: Should You Call the IRS?

LayoutNode.Content: The IRS issues most refunds in less than 21 days, although some require additional time. You should only call if it has been: 21 days or more since you e-filed 6 weeks or more since you mailed your return, or when "Where's My Refund" tells you to contact the IRS
LayoutNode.SRC:
The IRS issues most refunds in less than 21 days, although some require additional time. You should only call if it has been:

  • 21 days or more since you e-filed
  • 6 weeks or more since you mailed your return, or when
  • "Where's My Refund" tells you to contact the IRS
